item.title: Brenda add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "Don't cry because it's over, smile because it happened." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Brenda add a quote by Fernando Pessoa
item.description: "No intelligent idea can gain general acceptance unless some stupidity is mixed in with it" -- Fernando Pessoa

item.title: Brenda add a quote by Don Marquis
item.description: "Procrastination is the art of keeping up with yesterday" -- Don Marquis

item.title: Brenda add a quote by Rodney Dangerfield
item.description: "What a kid I got, I told him about the birds and the bees and he told me about the butcher and my wife." -- Rodney Dangerfield

item.title: Brenda add a quote by Rodney Dangerfield
item.description: "Once I pulled a job, I was so stupid. I picked a guy's pocket on an airplane and made a run for it." -- Rodney Dangerfield

item.title: Brenda add a quote by Robert Orben
item.description: "Illegal aliens have always been a problem in the United States. Ask any Indian." -- Robert Orben

item.title: Brenda add a quote by Rodney Dangerfield
item.description: "I came from a real tough neighborhood. Once a guy pulled a knife on me. I knew he wasn't a professional, the knife had butter on it." -- Rodney Dangerfield

item.title: Brenda add a quote by Kurt Vonnegut
item.description: "Those who believe in telekinetics, raise my hand." -- Kurt Vonnegut

item.title: Brenda add a quote by Phyllis Diller
item.description: "Never go to bed mad. Stay up and fight." -- Phyllis Diller

item.title: Brenda add a quote by Yogi Berra
item.description: "Always go to other people's funerals, otherwise they won't come to yours." -- Yogi Berra

item.title: Brenda add a quote by Charles Bukowski
item.description: "in this land some of us fuck more than we die but most of us die better than we fuck" -- Charles Bukowski

item.title: Brenda add a quote by Samuel Beckett
item.description: "The earth makes a sound as of sighs and the last drops fall from the emptied cloudless sky. A small boy, stretching out his hands and looking up at the blue sky, asked his mother how such a thing was possible. Fuck off, she said." -- Samuel Beckett

item.title: Brenda add a quote by Patti Smith
item.description: "I don't fuck much with the past but I fuck plenty with the future." -- Patti Smith

item.title: Brenda add a quote by Jerry Seinfeld
item.description: "If a book about failures doesn't sell, is it a success?" -- Jerry Seinfeld

item.title: Brenda add a quote by Lemony Snicket
item.description: "Everyone should be able to do one card trick, tell two jokes, and recite three poems, in case they are ever trapped in an elevator." -- Lemony Snicket

item.title: Brenda add a quote by Winston S. Churchill
item.description: "A lie gets halfway around the world before the truth has a chance to get its pants on." -- Winston S. Churchill

item.title: Brenda add a quote by John Green
item.description: "It's not because I want to make out with her." Hold on." He grabbed a pencil and scrawled excitedly at the paper as if he'd just made a mathematical breakthrough and then looked back up at me. "I just did some calculations, and I've been able to determine that you're full of shit" -- John Green

item.title: Brenda add a quote by Cathy Guiswite
item.description: "When life gives you lemons, squirt someone in the eye." -- Cathy Guiswite

item.title: Brenda add a quote by Gena Showalter
item.description: "Ten Things You Shouldn't Say on a Date. 1. You're wearing that? 2. Something smells funny. 3. Where's the Tylenol? 4. And to think, I first wanted to date your brother. 5. I have a confession to make… 6. My dad has a suit just like that. 7. That man is hot. Look at him. 8. My ex, may he rot in hell forever… 9. You're going to order that? Seriously? 10. You're how old?" -- Gena Showalter

item.title: Brenda add a quote by Bill Cosby
item.description: "A word to the wise ain't necessary, it's the stupid ones who need advice." -- Bill Cosby

item.title: Brenda add a quote by Shel Silverstein
item.description:
"I cannot go to school today" Said little Peggy Ann McKay. "I have the measles and the mumps, A gash, a rash and purple bumps.
My mouth is wet, my throat is dry. I'm going blind in my right eye. My tonsils are as big as rocks, I've counted sixteen chicken pox.
And there's one more - that's seventeen, And don't you think my face looks green? My leg is cut, my eyes are blue, It might be the instamatic flu.
I cough and sneeze and gasp and choke, I'm sure that my left leg is broke. My hip hurts when I move my chin, My belly button's caving in.
My back is wrenched, my ankle's sprained, My 'pendix pains each time it rains. My toes are cold, my toes are numb,
I have a sliver in my thumb.
My neck is stiff, my voice is weak, I hardly whisper when I speak. My tongue is filling up my mouth,
I think my hair is falling out.
My elbow's bent, my spine ain't straight, My temperature is one-o-eight. My brain is shrunk, I cannot hear,
There's a hole inside my ear.
I have a hangnail, and my heart is ... What? What's that? What's that you say? You say today is .............. Saturday?
G'bye, I'm going out to play!" -- Shel Silverstein

item.title: Brenda add a quote by George Carlin
item.description: "When I ask how old your toddler is, I don't need to hear '27 months.' 'He's two' will do just fine. He's not a cheese. And I didn't really care in the first place." -- George Carlin

item.title: Brenda add a quote by Jane Austen
item.description: "I do not want people to be very agreeable, as it saves me the trouble of liking them a great deal." -- Jane Austen

item.title: Brenda add a quote by Neil Armstrong
item.description: "I believe that every human has a finite amount of heartbeats. I don't intend to waste any of mine running around doing exercises." -- Neil Armstrong

item.title: Brenda add a quote by Charles Bukowski
item.description: "I don't hate people. I just feel better when they aren't around." -- Charles Bukowski

item.title: Brenda add a quote by Paul Terry
item.description: "Whenever I feel the need to exercise, I lie down until it goes away." -- Paul Terry

item.title: Brenda add a quote by Bob Marley
item.description: "I don't stand for black man's side, I don't stand for white man's side, I stand for God's side." -- Bob Marley

item.title: Brenda add a quote by Johnny Depp
item.description: "If someone were to harm my family or a friend or somebody I love, I would eat them. I might end up in jail for 500 years, but I would eat them." -- Johnny Depp

item.title: Brenda add a quote by Ambrose Bierce
item.description: "The covers of this book are too far apart." -- Ambrose Bierce

item.title: Brenda add a quote by Hailey Abbott
item.description: "I really hope he shapes up, you know? He’s got a good head on his shoulders when he’s not trying to give himself alcohol poisoning." -- Hailey Abbott
